go_data.justification: LTbetaR interacts with LTalpha1beta2, suggesting it has tumor necrosis factor receptor activity.
LTbetaR elicits a cytotoxic signal through LTalpha1beta2-LTbetaR interactions, indicating involvement in cell surface receptor signaling.
As a receptor, LTbetaR is likely located in the plasma membrane to interact with its ligands.
